SELECT emp.emp_id, emp.emp_name, uo.create_time, uo.order_id, u.user_name, u.user_phone, u.user_idcard, u.user_address, u.user_id, ( CASE WHEN ( account_state NOT IN (1, 3) OR account_state IS NULL ) THEN uo.order_payment ELSE NULL END ) AS baseOrderPayment, ( CASE WHEN ( account_state NOT IN (1, 3) OR account_state IS NULL ) THEN uo.order_gas ELSE NULL END ) AS baseOrderGas, ( CASE WHEN (account_state IN (1)) THEN uo.order_payment ELSE NULL END ) AS launchOrderPayment, ( CASE WHEN (account_state IN (1)) THEN uo.order_gas ELSE NULL END ) AS launchOrderGas, ( CASE WHEN (order_type = 3) THEN uo.order_payment ELSE NULL END ) AS replacementOrderPayment, ( CASE WHEN (order_type = 3) THEN uo.order_gas ELSE NULL END ) AS replacementOrderGas, uc.`card_cost` FROM user_orders uo LEFT JOIN employee emp ON uo.employee_id = emp.emp_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON uo.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN user_card uc ON uo.order_id = uc.order_id WHERE emp.usable = 1 AND uo.usable = 1 AND u.usable = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(uo.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate}
AND DATE_FORMAT(uo.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate}
AND emp.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName}, '%')
AND (uo.account_state NOT IN (1, 3)OR uo.account_state IS NULL)
AND uo.account_state IN (1)
AND uo.order_type = 3
